reviews.text: Stayed here for one night. Good motel, clean and tidy, with reasonably large rooms and 15 minutes walk into town. Free wifi which worked OK. Friendly and helpful host.
reviews.title: Good, clean and tidy motel
Okay for one night.
reviews.text: As we had already visited penguins in Dunedin, we should have driven further rather than spending one of our precious nights in Oamaru. Although the town is interesting enough, unless you want to stop for the penguins, this would make a good lunch stop rather than overnight.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Quite comfortable, roomy, adequate. Nothing out of the box but definitely a place to break your journey. Oamaru is a nice little town, the old quarter is beautiful. The penguins are adorable and make Oamaru a worthwhile stop.
reviews.title: Not the best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was small and upstairs. It was adequate enough but just a room. In hindsitght we erred in breaking our journey in this town. The victorian section of town was interesting but not worth more than half an hour. Restaurants few and far between and the ones recommended by the motel were not our style and expensive. The one thing the motel did know was not to go to the local club. We thought we would give it a try and the restaurant attached was marvellous but pretty empty.The staff here were friendly which is more than can be said of the club staff who were downright rude. Give Oamaru a miss
reviews.title: Clean place reasonale rates

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This motel was spacious (studio) all kitchen facilities. It was very clean and in a good place in town. Beds were comfy and the service was very good. The only bad thing was the internet service was terrible.
reviews.title: Thank you Elton John
